accountId.description: AWS account ID for the account.

administratorId.description: AWS account ID for the administrator account.

disableEmailNotification.description: If set to true, then the root user of the invited account will _not_ receive an email notification. This notification is in addition to an alert that the root user receives in AWS Personal Health Dashboard. By default, this is set to `false`.

graphArn.description: ARN of the behavior graph to invite the member accounts to contribute their data to.

invitedTime.description: Date and time, in UTC and extended RFC 3339 format, when an Amazon Detective membership invitation was last sent to the account.

message.description: A custom message to include in the invitation. Amazon Detective adds this message to the standard content that it sends for an invitation.

status.description: Current membership status of the member account.

updatedTime.description: Date and time, in UTC and extended RFC 3339 format, of the most recent change to the member account's status.

volumeUsageInBytes.description: Data volume in bytes per day for the member account.

accountId.description: AWS account ID for the account.

graphArn.description: ARN of the behavior graph to invite the member accounts to contribute their data to.

message.description: A custom message to include in the invitation. Amazon Detective adds this message to the standard content that it sends for an invitation.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Member resources.
